messages.id: Be very careful. This information is sensitive and could potentially contain very private information. Only turn on these settings if you absolutely need it for debugging.

messages.translation: Be very careful. This information is sensitive and could potentially contain very private information. Only turn on these settings if you absolutely need it for debugging.

messages.id: By clicking Yes, this meeting will end.
messages.message: By clicking Yes, this meeting will end.
messages.translation: By clicking Yes, this meeting will end.

messages.id: By clicking Yes, you will leave this meeting.

messages.id: Configuration settings will be lost in the next session
messages.message: Configuration settings will be lost in the next session
messages.translation: Configuration settings will be lost in the next session

messages.id: If you backup the configuration file, we will reset the settings and continue normally. If the configuration file is encrypted, then we will ask you for a password to encrypt the new settings file.
messages.message: If you backup the configuration file, we will reset the settings and continue normally. If the configuration file is encrypted, then we will ask you for a password to encrypt the new settings file.
messages.translation: If you backup the configuration file, we will reset the settings and continue normally. If the configuration file is encrypted, then we will ask you for a password to encrypt the new settings file.

messages.id: If you set this option to a file name, low level information will be logged there.
messages.message: If you set this option to a file name, low level information will be logged there.
messages.translation: If you set this option to a file name, low level information will be logged there.

messages.id: Keep configuration file when Wahay closes

messages.translation: Keep configuration file when Wahay closes

messages.id: Log debug output to the selected log file. If no file is selected then the log output will be written to the default log file.
messages.message: Log debug output to the selected log file. If no file is selected then the log output will be written to the default log file.
messages.translation: Log debug output to the selected log file. If no file is selected then the log output will be written to the default log file.

messages.id: Now you are hosting a meeting.
messages.message: Now you are hosting a meeting.
messages.translation: Now you are hosting a meeting.

messages.id: Please enter the master password for the configuration file.
messages.message: Please enter the master password for the configuration file.
messages.translation: Please enter the master password for the configuration file.

messages.id: If you want to use your own Mumble instance, please enter the location where Mumble is available in the system.
messages.message: If you want to use your own Mumble instance, please enter the location where Mumble is available in the system.
messages.translation: If you want to use your own Mumble instance, please enter the location where Mumble is available in the system.

messages.id: If you want to set up a custom port to run the Mumble service, please a port number between 1 and 65535
messages.message: If you want to set up a custom port to run the Mumble service, please a port number between 1 and 65535
messages.translation: If you want to set up a custom port to run the Mumble service, please a port number between 1 and 65535

messages.id: Specify a password for the meeting
messages.message: Specify a password for the meeting
messages.translation: Specify a password for the meeting

messages.id: The meeting ID is invalid, please check it.
messages.message: The meeting ID is invalid, please check it.
messages.translation: The meeting ID is invalid, please check it.

messages.id: A valid port is between 1 and 65535
messages.message: A valid port is between 1 and 65535
messages.translation: A valid port is between 1 and 65535

messages.id: Type the Meeting ID (normally a .onion address)
messages.message: Type the Meeting ID (normally a .onion address)
messages.translation: Type the Meeting ID (normally a .onion address)

messages.id: Type the password to join the meeting
messages.message: Type the password to join the meeting

messages.id: We have detected that the configuration file is invalid or corrupted. Do you want to make a copy (backup) of it and continue?
messages.message: We have detected that the configuration file is invalid or corrupted. Do you want to make a copy (backup) of it and continue?
messages.translation: We have detected that the configuration file is invalid or corrupted. Do you want to make a copy (backup) of it and continue?

messages.id: When this option is checked, the configuration settings will be stored in the device.
messages.message: When this option is checked, the configuration settings will be stored in the device.
messages.translation: When this option is checked, the configuration settings will be stored in the device.

messages.id: You will not be asked for this password again until you restart Wahay.
messages.message: You will not be asked for this password again until you restart Wahay.
messages.translation: You will not be asked for this password again until you restart Wahay.
